data.text: @TheKittykitkat Hi, everyone can, of course, still choose to wear a mask while travelling to have additional protection for personal reasons. FFP2 and FFP3 masks are proven to give excellent, more than 95% protection, even if others around you are not using masks. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Facemask policy on our flights
urls.description: Wearing a mask on our flights is optional, unless it is required by the authorities of your destination or origin country. As coronavirus pandemic is moving to a new phase and coronavirus related restrictions are being removed across countries, we at Finnair are lifting the requirement to wear a face mask on board our flights. Wearing a mask on our flights is optional, unless it is required by the authorities of your destination or origin country. On flights where using a mask is an authority requirement,

data.text: Finnair supports Ukrainians with a 95% discount on net fares for one-way tickets from Warsaw, Krakow, Gdansk, Budapest and Prague to Helsinki. urls.title: Inspiration, information and travel extras to make your holiday planning easy
urls.description: Planning your next unforgettable holiday is easy with Finnair’s wide range of digital services. There are several services available on Finnair.com that will help you to easily plan your trip and also tailor your journey with travel extras. Still deciding on your next destination? Check out our Flight offers page to find out which destinations we currently have in our network, and what the starting from fares are. You can also search destinations by country and see, for instance, all our destinations in

data.text: Dreaming of a summer holiday, but unsure about the destination? You can find all Finnair destinations on our Flight offers page, flight schedules on our Timetables page and intriguing and useful travel tips in our Blue Wings stories. https://t.co/13SYED6Ndu
@real_bitchcraft Hi, yes. We have extended this for now until the end of April. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: New cabin
urls.description: Experience the new sensation of flying with Finnair. Our redesigned long-haul cabin will elevate your travel experience to a whole new level.

data.text: @ArtoKayhko @TopiManner Hi Arto, the first routes in which you can experience the entire new elevated long-haul experience are Dallas, New York and Singapore from 11 May onwards: https://t.co/AreDNeQyDD. Other ones will follow afterwards. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Five reasons Finnair's new Business Class is the ultimate way to travel
urls.description: Finnair’s all new Business Class cabin, rolling out across our entire long haul fleet throughout 2022 and 2023, is a true game changer. With an incredible seat, gorgeous Nordic design and food inspired by our roots as well as our destinations, it’s set to be the ultimate way to travel between Europe, the USA and Asia. Here are five reasons why you should book a ticket now and get set to take to the skies. It’s the first thing you’ll notice when you board. Our new Air Lounge seat is a spectacular piece of

urls.title: Smooth travelling at Helsinki Airport
urls.description: Flying via Helsinki means that you can enjoy the compact and uncrowded Helsinki Airport, where all the gates and services are located under one roof, in one terminal building. Helsinki Airport welcomes you with its new spacious arrival and departure halls! As the main transit area for Finnair customers, the brand-new terminal will make connections extra quick and smooth. Catching a train, bus or taxi to or from the airport is now easier than ever as everything is nearby the terminal entrance. The

data.text: Helsinki Airport’s beautiful, new terminal building opened in December, and all Finnair departure hall services are now at your service in the new terminal. Security control is partly available in the new premises and partly in the old until late May. https://t.co/pbtG4v5GH3

urls.title: Travelling to Finland
urls.description: Finland has opened for travel from the EU and Schengen countries. Travel from outside of the EU and Schengen area remains restricted. Finnish authorities define the entry requirements to Finland. See more detailed instructions below. Please also note that travel restrictions are subject to change at short notice. As a traveller, you are always responsible for ensuring that you fulfil the requirements of your destination and possible transit country. You can check the current entry restrictions to Finland

urls.title: Tips for travelling during the summer season and peak hours
urls.description: We collected tips for you for smooth travelling during the busy summer season. During the peak hours and busier times, the number of customers at the airports and on our flights increases. Busy times are expected from time to time, and various service points as well as security checks may be congested. Also, this summer quickly increased travel and global labour shortages of airport operators and ground service providers, are causing congestion at many European airports. Below you’ll find some tips on

data.text: As the number of customers at Helsinki Airport and on our flights increases during the busier travel times, we recommend you do the check-in in advance and arrive at the airport early to get a smooth start to your journey. data.text: @VOliver123 @FinnairHelps our narrowbody short-haul aircraft as the lavatories are not accessible with a wheelchair. @VOliver123 @FinnairHelps Hi, we apologise sincerely for the difficulties experienced by Sophie Morgan during her recent flight with us and have been in direct contact with her to discuss this to ensure similar situations can be avoided in the future. We do not have aisle wheelchairs available in (1/4)

@doankev Unfortunately I couldn't with previous messages with your nickname, so that I could find your case reference number and check the situation. -Sara

Combining different modes of transport is one way to reduce the carbon footprint. From 2 May onwards, we operate to Turku and Tampere by flying and with a new kind of bus connection – both are on sale now. Read more: https://t.co/FZ1b23ZVKe https://t.co/9Ao8HQasCA

data.text: @mokki142 Hi, wine and beer are complimentary with the first meal service in our long-haul Economy Class. For the rest of the flight, all non-alcoholic drinks are complimentary, and you can purchase different alcoholic beverages. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
RT @Tartu2024: Tartu is now closer to Europe! ✈️ Flights between Tartu and Helsinki resumed last week. Flights operated by @Finnair take pl…

urls.title: Flight bookings | select country and language
urls.description: Finnair flies the shortcut between Europe and Asia. Start by selecting your country and preferred language and then proceed to booking your flights.

domain.name: Cities
domain.description: Cities around the world

data.text: @CA12756455 Hi, our Tokyo flights are currently flying over the North Pole and the exact flight time depends on the winds, however it should be altogether less than 20 hours. You can check the options on https://t.co/WWKAxOEyod. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@anita_couto Our pleasure - thank you for flying with us! 💙
@Nursingcursing Hi, we have different customer service numbers depending on the country. You can find them at the end of this page: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@occupiedspace_ Hi, Manage booking has had some issues, but it's currently working for most cases. I'm very sorry for the inconvenience! If you aren't able to change your flight, please contact our customer service: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@Abhinavaug Hi, there are issues in some cases, unfortunately. If it's not working for you, please contact our customer service: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy if you need to change your travel dates. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

domain.name: Cities
domain.description: Cities around the world

data.text: Looking for an adventure? Colourful Mumbai is an immersive mix of enchanting hustle and bustle with urban surprises. Check out our travel tips for a trip to remember: https://t.co/F2I3aErXoq. We fly to Mumbai 3 times per week starting on 6 August. The flights are on sale now.

data.text: @daytradesignals Hi, we use Terminal 3 at London Heathrow. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@notkaranthapar @FinnairHelps Hi Karan, I am truly sorry for the congestion in our customer service at the moment. Please try reaching them again through the chatbot or by calling them. You can find all the phone numbers here: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Pets on Finnair flights
urls.description: Information about transporting pets on Finnair flights.

data.text: @SashaSuzume Hi, it is possible if your dog and the pet carrier weigh 8kg max and comply with the required measurements. Please make the reservation for your pet through our chatbot after you have booked your own flight. Read more here: https://t.co/YGwvljkmUR. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Pets on Finnair flights
urls.description: Information about transporting pets on Finnair flights.

data.text: @poginigreine Please read more here: https://t.co/YGwvljkmUR. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@poginigreine Hi, unfortunately it's not possible to know in advance. Generally, we accept two pets on board each flight. If you make a reservation for your pets within 24h after purchasing your own flight ticket, you are entitled to a refund in case we cannot confirm your pets to your flight.

@mokki142 Hi, we serve a wide range of complimentary beverages in our Economy Class on our long-haul flights, and complimentary blueberry juice and water on our short-haul flights. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Change your booking flexibly
urls.description: With our updated ticket policy, you can now change your travel dates with more flexibility. Book Finnair flights and travel with confidence!

data.text: With our flexible booking policy, you can book flights and make your travel plans more worry-free and flexibly. Until 31 May 2022, you can change your travel dates as many times as you wish. After that, you can still make one additional change. https://t.co/NQN3hfqxdl
We have some exciting news for you: Santa Claus, whose childhood dream was to work as a pilot, is joining our flight crew and starting as a long-haul co-pilot as of today. https://t.co/fiiBqp5wSo

data.text: We commit to Science-Based Targets initiative (SBTi) and bring our CO2 emissions reduction targets in line with the UN Paris Climate Agreement. #SBTi https://t.co/TcveJDD6or https://t.co/IG9esNND2M

urls.title: Sights, scents, and flavours in Singapore
urls.description: Singapore really has it all: some of the best shopping in the world, more food options than you can imagine, entertainment to keep you busy for years and lots of green space for relaxing. Open your senses and take it all in! Singapore's famous Hawker Centres, cooked food markets, are the place to go if you want to sample a variety of great quality local dishes - for a modest price tag. The most popular is Lau Pa Sat seating over 2000 people. The offering includes traditional dishes such as Hor Fun (a

data.text: Singapore really has it all: more food options than you can imagine, entertainment to keep you busy, lots of green space to enjoy and endless shopping opportunities. Check out our tips for intriguing Singapore to make the most of your next trip: https://t.co/p39N4R97ov. https://t.co/Gu2TcShFhs

urls.title: Travel requirements map
urls.description: Use the interactive travel map to find out where you can fly with Finnair and what guidelines you need to follow in each destination.

data.text: @ToorenKlaas Hi, the destination countries determine the travel requirements. Please find out about the requirements here: https://t.co/gFcDo9W37x Heidi / Finnair

urls.title: Use our handy and quick online services for Finnair Plus members
urls.description: Finnair offers many digital services for our Plus members, and we are even developing new online features constantly. You can for example take care of your bookings, update your personal information, or use your Finnair Plus points online. As a Finnair Plus member you have the option to handle most of your travel and membership needs online. Our fast-developing digital services mean that you need to contact our customer servic e less and less. - The most important benefit for our customers is speed. Our

data.text: We offer multiple digital services for our Finnair Plus members and develop new online features constantly. You can, for example, take care of your bookings, update your personal information or use your Finnair Plus points online. Read more: https://t.co/lyUcZ3Ay4e

domain.name: Ongoing News Story
domain.description: Ongoing News Stories like 'Brexit'

data.text: Yesterday marked 30 years since we resumed flights between Helsinki and Riga. The first flights to Riga started back in 1927. They were suspended due to the division of Europe during World War II and the post-war period. We currently have three daily flights to Riga. https://t.co/hFlE2mt0DD

@GeneralManaker @FinnairSuomi Pisteiden siirto tililtä toiselle ei aktivoi/siirrä pisteiden vanhenemispäivämäärää, eli sitä ei lasketa tapahtumaksi ystävän tilillä. Siirretyt pisteet vanhenevat sen tilin mukaan, mille ne siirretään.

urls.title: Pre-order meals
urls.description: Make the most of your time in the air with Finnair's pre-order sandwiches and tasty hot meals for Economy Class flights.

data.text: From 2 May, you can travel between Turku and Helsinki, and Tampere and Helsinki by air or with a new bus connection that smoothly links to and from connecting flights at Helsinki Airport. Combining different modes of transport reduces the carbon footprint. https://t.co/FZ1b23ZVKe https://t.co/jaaaF3ezYp

urls.title: New cabin
urls.description: Experience the new sensation of flying with Finnair. Our redesigned long-haul cabin will elevate your travel experience to a whole new level.

data.text: Our new long-haul experience is designed by people, for people. Step inside the creative journey. ‘Creating the elevated long-haul experience’ is a 6-part series which uncovers the experts and challenges behind our entirely renewed long-haul cabin. https://t.co/azubqOuzLr https://t.co/mM5DT0TUDs
@jyrkiw Hei, kiitos palautteestasi! Kuulutuksiimme on tulossa päivitystä vielä tämän kevään ja kesän aikana. Ystävällisin terveisin, Ada/Finnair

@JuhoKoskivuo Hei Juho, olen pahoillani aiheutuneesta harmista! Olemme monista eri syistä, viimeisimpänä Venäjän ilmatilan sulkeminen, joutuneet muuttamaan lentojen aikatauluja tai perumaan niitä. Toivottavasti tilanne helpottaa loppuvuodeksi. Ystävällisin terveisin, Ada/Finnair
